alert.note: Alert for Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 6:43AM EST until February 28 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following county, Noble. * WHEN...Until noon EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 641 AM EST, runoff from heavy rain on Tuesday continues to cause a rise above flood stage on the West Fork of Duck Creek. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dexter City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
